categoryItems.name: Dark Patterns
categoryItems.copy:
Dark Patterns is a website detailing all different kinds of Dark Patterns.
What are Dark Patterns? Dark Patterns are tricks used in websites and apps that make you do things that you didn't mean to, like buying or signing up for something.

categoryItems.name: Copytesting
categoryItems.copy: Improve your website copy using quantified data, from real people. Copytesting is the only audience research tool for copy. Get data on where your copy misses the mark, so you can fix it, and increase sales.

categoryItems.name: Google Optimize
categoryItems.copy:
Google Optimize is a service that Google provides as a part of their Google Marketing Platform.
Your website is your store window. Engage your website visitors like never before. Create personalized experiences and run website tests ‚Äî for free.

categoryItems.name: Hotjar
categoryItems.copy:
Hotjar is a powerful tool that reveals the online behavior and voice of your users.
By combining both Analysis and Feedback tools, Hotjar gives you the ‚Äòbig picture‚Äô of how to improve your site's user experience and performance/conversion rates.

categoryItems.name: Usabilla
categoryItems.copy:
Use digital customer feedback to understand the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind your data.
Ask your users the right questions at the right moment in their customer journey to make better informed decisions

categoryItems.name: Visual Website Optimizer (VWO)
categoryItems.copy: VWO (previously Visual Website Optimizer) optimizes customer experience, by improving conversions through visitor analysis, experimentation & re-engagement.

categoryItems.name: Smashing Magazine
categoryItems.copy: Established online magazine for professional web designers and developers; check out their dedicated UX Design category for practical tips, useful guidelines, best practices and case studies.

categoryItems.name: UX Booth
categoryItems.copy: The UX Booth is a publication by and for the user experience community. Our readership consists mostly of beginning-to-intermediate user experience and interaction designers, but anyone interested in making the web a better place to be is welcome.

categoryItems.name: UX Mastery
categoryItems.copy: UX Mastery‚Äôs global community is curious and collaborative, with a passion for practical, insightful content and services that help with their career, their teams and their projects.

categoryItems.name: UX Collective
categoryItems.copy: A big part of what we learned in UX comes from online reading: articles, tutorials, resources, blogs. It‚Äôs all available out there‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääbut there's a lot. UX is becoming increasingly popular, and with that comes a lot of clutter, noise and disorientation.

categoryItems.name: Don't Make Me Think - Steve Krug
categoryItems.copy: Established online magazine for professional web designers and developers; check out their dedicated UX Design category for practical tips, useful guidelines, best practices and case studies.

categoryItems.name: The Elements of User Experience - Jesse James Garrett
categoryItems.copy: Smart organizations recognize that Web design is more than just creating clean code and sharp graphics. A site that really works fulfills your strategic objectives while meeting the needs of your users.

categoryItems.name: The UX Team of One - Leah Buley
categoryItems.copy: The User Experience Team of One prescribes a range of approaches that have big impact and take less time and fewer resources than the standard lineup of UX deliverables.

categoryItems.name: Adele
categoryItems.copy: The repository of publicly available design systems and pattern libraries.

categoryItems.name: UI Garage
categoryItems.copy: Daily handpicked UI inspiration & patternsFind specific design inspiration for web, mobile and tablet. Search over 4,547 patterns categorized and handpicked for you.

categoryItems.name: UI-Patterns
categoryItems.copy: User Interface Design patterns are recurring solutions that solve common design problems. Design patterns are standard reference points for the experienced user interface designer.

categoryItems.name: Sidebar
categoryItems.copy: Since 2012, Sidebar has been collecting the best links about UI design, typography, CSS, user research, and all other facets of design.

categoryItems.name: Users Know: What is Wrong with UX?
categoryItems.copy: Laura Klein, Author of Build Better Products & UX for Lean Startups, talks together with her colleague Kate all about everything wrong with UX nowadays.

categoryItems.name: Design Details
categoryItems.copy: Brian Lovin & Marshal Bock are both designers who love talking about design, development, products, interfaces, games, and more. Marshall currently leads design at YouTube Gaming and Brian is working on GitHub's native mobile apps.

categoryItems.name: Growth Design: Psych 101
categoryItems.copy: Growth Design talks about 101 different cognitive biases and design principles (with examples and tips) and how these influence your user experience.

categoryItems.name: Humane by Design
categoryItems.copy: A resource that provides guidance for designing ethically humane digital products through patterns focused on user well-being.

categoryItems.name: Interaction Design Foundation
categoryItems.copy: We are an independent nonprofit initiative with an objective that sounds like a paradox: ‚ÄúRaise global design education to an Ivy League standard, while at the same time reduce costs to as low as possible.‚Äù

categoryItems.name: Maze
categoryItems.copy: Maze is a user testing platform that turns your prototype into actionable insights from real users, bringing confidence to the design process.

categoryItems.name: Tobii (pro)
categoryItems.copy: Eye-tracking for research. We help businesses and science professionals gain real insights into human behaviour with world-leading eye tracking solutions and services. Tobii Pro Insight, our research consultancy, conducts attention-based studies helping organizations make better business-critical decisions.

categoryItems.name: Mike Locke
categoryItems.copy: Passionate and successful thought-leader in UI/UX Design with high proficiencies in Problem Solving, Visual UI Design and UX Design Methods and Principles.

categoryItems.name: The Futur
categoryItems.copy: The Futur is an online education platform loaded with content, courses, and tools to help you build better design skills and better creative businesses.
